content.body:
> <@tabatkins:matrix.org> There's no literal syntax for Infra structs, right?

No, although I created a new class="props" in a PR which you can see at https://whatpr.org/html/6315/history.html#snapshotting-source-snapshot-params , which I was planning to add to Bikeshed at some point
